exceptions.tactic: intros f Hf f' Hf' g Hg.
exists (fun x y => g (f x) (f' x)).
exceptions.exn: The reference g was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: exists (fun y => (fun x y => g (f x) (f' x)) x y).
exceptions.exn: The reference g was not found in the current environment.

original: unfold isPR. intros f Hf f' Hf' g Hg. exists (fun x y => g (f x) (f' x)). intros x. exists (fun y => (fun x y => g (f x) (f' x)) x y). split. - apply Hg. - split; apply Hf.
